synthesis_conditions.additional_notes: The synthesis conditions produced larger crystals with most being twinned and possessing truncated-diamond morphology, while untwined crystals were cube-shaped.

activation_and_loading_conditions.temperature: Evacuated for 72 hrs at 10-3 mbar followed by heating at 80 oC under vacuum for 80 min
activation_and_loading_conditions.additional_notes: After complete activation, the sample was backfilled with CO2 (850 mbar, 293 K) and allowed to equilibrate for an hour before being flame sealed.

x-ray_diffraction_conditions.equipment: Bruker AXS diffractometer with Cu K radiation ( = 1.54078 Å) and equipped with APEX II CCD detector and a monocap extension
x-ray_diffraction_conditions.additional_notes: Intensity data collection was performed in the ω-ϕ scanning mode. The diffraction spots were measured in full with high accuracy, scaled, corrected for Lorentz-polarization correction, and integrated using SAINT.

synthesis_conditions.equipment: Accelerated Surface Area & Porosimetry System (ASAP) 2020 supplied by Micromeritics Instruments Inc.

sample_preparation.activation_conditions: Heated under vacuum (~10-6 mbar) in two stages, initially to 60 °C at 1°C/min for 2 hrs then to 100 °C at 1°C/min for 12 hrs
sample_preparation.additional_notes: After heating, the sample was backfilled with N2 before being transferred to the analysis port where it was evacuated for at least a further 240 min before the analysis was started.
